website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice if you don't need spoons and like the idea of the bonus coffee scoop.
pros: Heavy-duty etched cups with attractive high-polish finish
We love the handy coffee scoop
cons: It's a costly set, and you don't get measuring spoons for the price

customer_reviews.title: Rusted After One Use
customer_reviews.text: Did quite a bit of research on these cups and bought them as a gift for someone. I was happy with my choice until the first use, when they rusted. If I'm being fair, only one rusted. But still, it is extremely disappointing that these cups that are advertised as dishwasher safe and rust proof are neither of those things
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heavy Duty Measuring Cups
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, solid and sturdy. Each cup also has additional measurements engraved into the cup. So for instance, you can take out the 1 cup and see the 1/2 cup mark etched on the inside. I believe I will have these for years. They also sit neatly inside each other so they are a space saver in your drawer.
customer_reviews.author: djdandylion

customer_reviews.title: Every household should have a set like these.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see that the measuring cups had more than one measurement stamped on the inside for easy measuring, but at least two. They are very sturdy and I love using them.
customer_reviews.author: mel55mel

customer_reviews.title: Black marks on cups & hydrophobic coating
customer_reviews.text: The structure of these measuring cups is pretty good, as is the accuracy (as ingredient measuring cups go). The first problem is that the cups arrived with black filth on them: appears to be grease or resin (but without testing it's hard to say conclusively). The second problem is that the cups appear to be coated with a hydrophobic compound (one that is not easily removed via mechanical and/or chemical cleaning) which means that they're probably not (1) clean (2) FDA approved (3) food safe (4) free from unknown chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: HASFKJlk

customer_reviews.title: This is the Genuine Product! Buy from this retailer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought another set of these from the Aisin Store that are NOT genuine Kitchenmade (TM) measurement cups. Check out the photos. Especially the engraved logo. These are the real deal. They are exactly what you want from measuring cups. Sturdy, well marked.
customer_reviews.author: pkdesign

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice measuring cup set and with 7 sizes is as complete a set as you can buy. We liked that the edges are smooth and don't feel sharp. The handles do not seem easy to bend and the finish on all the cups was good. We bought and returned another 7 piece stainless measuring cup set that was less expensive but the quality was not what was desired. These are downgraded to four stars solely because of price. We think that they are a bit expensive. The quality is just what we wanted. We will be using this set for many years, good riddance to the plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Debi B.

customer_reviews.title: We love these, attractive, functional, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with these measuring cups. We have been using some Tupperware measuring cups for a couple of decades. They worked fine, but we are migrating to stainless steel, glass, ceramics, and cast iron for all of our kitchen ware and cookware. These are attractive and very functional. They are also easier to clean than plastic. When you measure oils in plastic measuring cups, it can take a bit of work and extra dish soap to get them really clean. With stainless steel, cleanup is extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned that the shorter handle would be difficult to hold, but they aren't. In fact I now prefer the shorter handle style to my other measuring cups that have a longer handle. They are shiny and of high quality steel. They don't tip over, and the pouring spout is really useful. These are now my go to measuring cups, and they will be my first choice if I buy more for myself or for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Great measuring cup set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these measuring cups after the numbers on my plastic ones wore off so you really had to look to see what size you were grabbing. I love these cups because they fit together well, the numbers will never come off, and some of the cups have 1/2 and 3/4 marks so you don't have to guess at how much either of those measurements would be, or try to figure out the conversion for them. I've found it handy that this set also includes the 1/8 cup, which a lot of other sets don't.
customer_reviews.author: readnbake

customer_reviews.title: The best measuring cup set ever
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality stainless steel. I like that I can set one of the cups on the counter without it tipping over while I fill it. I like the measurements on the inside for lesser quantities. This is money well spent. I do not take my kitchenware for granted. I search and research before I make a purchase because I want quality products that will last. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lindalu

customer_reviews.title: Happy Baker
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY happy with these measuring cups. I had originally gone on site to order cups recommended in Real Simple magazine but when I visited other options I could not justify the price of "recommended" product. I am so pleased to have a 3/4 and 2/3 measuring cup and really like that those cups are both inside and outside marked with other measuring options. These cups have a good "feel" to them...not too heavy and not too light but just right! I am pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the set when I received it, although the handles are a little short. Super disappointed though that the top rim of the cups are already rusted. Not nearly the quality I expected. Would return if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these for my daughter who is just getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter who is just getting started setting up her own kitchen. They have the 1/3 and 2/3 cups which is a must as far as I am concerned. I am so impressed with them, I am going to order a set for myself. The handles are not welded or riveted on, they are one solid unit. Plus, they come with a lifetime guarantee. I feel that they are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels great for metal kitchen tools
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design with every size necessary for cooking. Soft edges so the metal feels good on delicate skin. Nice little flanges to keep each cup from sinking into the next one. Worth the time to spend hand washing them.
customer_reviews.author: Island Crew

customer_reviews.title: They measure fine, If the printing was in black the measurements ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. The markings are on the outside of the cup, so if you hold the cup in your left hand, you can read the measurements. If you're right handed when you hold the cup up to read the measurement, it is backwards, imprinted on the inside of the cup. They measure fine, If the printing was in black the measurements wouild be easier to read. My eyesight isn't what it use to be so those are just my thoughts. . The best measureing cups I ever owned were tupperware. They were light and the printing was in color.
customer_reviews.author: Gail C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product - lots of easy ways to measure
customer_reviews.text: Great measuring cups! I finally decided to upgrade my cheap plastic measuring cups, and these are fantastic. I love that there are no extraneous lips or feet for flour to get stuck in (which are hard to clean), so these clean up and dry easily. I especially like that increments are labeled on the larger sizes - and you can read them from the inside - so it's super easy to use just the one cup measuring cup for multiple liquid measurements. I sprung a bit more for the coffee measure in the set, but actually haven't used it just yet.
customer_reviews.author: janemcg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shiny Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite measuring cups which are a nice quality shiny stainless steel. The other set I have is plastic & one of them fell from top dishwasher rack & melted on dw heating element. This stainless steel set can be put on the bottom rack if I run out of room on top rack. I do however attach the measuring cup to the rack using the hole in the handle. I will have this set for a life time. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: cherryroses

customer_reviews.title: Great Measuring Cups!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these measuring cups! They include "2/3" and "3/4" measure, which many measuring cup sets don't. These are a really heavy weight, which is wonderful, as it prevents spilling. They have a small tab on the side of each cup opposite the handle so that when you nest them, one doesn't "fall inside" the other - really nice feature! I'll be buying these again for gifts. GREAT product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups will replace the 3 other sets that I've purchased in the past (not from Amazon). 2 sets were plastic and got stained and or broken. The other wasn't a very good quality metal like this set is. I like the fact that the bottom is rounded and whatever I put into them will be easier to come out. I love the fact that it has a 1/8th cup! None of my other sets had one. They are all going in the garbage- this set is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: J. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are great measuring cups. The handles are stout so they don't bend and they are short enough to fit the dishwasher easily. The markings are stamped in so you never have to worry about them wearing off like has happened with some plastic cups with decals for the marks. I really like the 1/8 cup measure as I seem to measure 2 tablespoons often. The outside of the cups is buffed and the inside is brushed.
customer_reviews.author: Franz

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made & Seem Durable
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups are well-made and sturdy. Each cup is one piece. The handles are not riveted on, so they cannot break off.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Brody

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best set I've ever had! They nest perfectly, taking up the bare minimum of space. The best thing is that the handle is part of the cup - no more broken-off handles! Love having this many sizes; eliminates the need for washing & drying cups in the middle of a project. Nice to have a 1/8 cup. Metal means they dry well, not like plastic that hold those water drops forever. Stable shape, they don't want to tip over, either when empty or while being filled. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cooking and baking. I love that they all stack and can also be hung on a hook if needed. MANY sizes so that's extra helpful. Love that they are stainless and not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: sj_reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great cups
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I love the extra cups like two thirds always a hard one to figure.They nest very well and you can easily tell if you are off as they nesting shows it
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: These measuring cups work great. My favorite thing is having a 2/3 cup ...
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups work great. My favorite thing is having a 2/3 cup and a 3/4 cup measuring cup. To me having these sizes is indispensable.
customer_reviews.author: E. Flores

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months . . .
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these measuring cups for about six months and cannot say enough good things about them. I love them! They are heavier than most. They have 1/8 cup and 3/4 cup sizes. They have gone through the dishwasher many times and are the same as new.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & attractive
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy and heavy, and made out of one piece of metal, so the handle won't break off. They stack perfectly in one another and take up very little space in the drawer. I like how each one has lines on the inside that mark other measures as well. They appear to measure true.
customer_reviews.author: MMc

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well built, clearly marked measuring cups.
customer_reviews.text: Very solidly built stainless steel. Easy to read markings. I love that they will stand on their own either filled or empty - nothing worse than cups that tip then spill all over. Nice solid value for money! I look forward to using these for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Samson

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be well made
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made of heavier gauge metal than most measuring cups. I like the way they stack together so they fit in my kitchen cabinet drawer. The 1/8 cup measure is nice. Wish they were USA made.
customer_reviews.author: Adele S.

customer_reviews.title: Fancy a cup-of?
customer_reviews.text: Really really good quality and with almost every cup size option you'd ever need. All-in-one design, with no riveting of handles means these good-quality cups should last a life time. The storage clip is easy to open and useful to have. A great wedding gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Woods

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups are very sturdy. They clean up easy and stack well. I like the short handles as the fit in your hand well. I also like that there is a 1/8 cup.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST measuring cup set
customer_reviews.text: I really love this measuring cup set! It has a 2 Tablespoon measuring cup.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Now I have a nice, new gleaming set of perfect cups
customer_reviews.text: I bake every day. I decided to clear my miscellaneous baking drawer of all icky looking measuring cups from that have accumulated from past years. Now I have a nice, new gleaming set of perfect cups. They feel good in my hand. I especially like that a 3/4 cup is included--that size measuring cup seems to be excluded in other sets. My drawer looks and feels better now.
customer_reviews.author: Dorie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and every size you need! I have been looking for this type for a while now and am so happy I ordered them!
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: The seamless design makes them easy to clean and prevents and buildup of ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This set features some of the odd measurements such as 1/8 c and 2/3 c that other sets don't include. The seamless design makes them easy to clean and prevents and buildup of ingredients. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amélie

customer_reviews.title: Best Measuring Cups Ever -
customer_reviews.text: I finally made the decision to move away from plastic measuring cups and bought this excellent set. Accurate, beautiful and they stack within each other neatly, saves cupboard space. So throw out your plastic cups and starting using this wonderful set, you never regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Wabeke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for measuring cups that had the measurements engraved rather than printed on the handles. These measuring cups are perfect. There are so many different cups with all the measures you would need. They stack and don't take up much space in my cabinet. Definitely worth paying a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: _iCarrie_

customer_reviews.title: Search no more, the perfect measuring cups!
customer_reviews.text: Most of all I love that these measuring cups stand up and don't tip over when they are empty. Having a cup just for 2/3s and another one just for 3/4s is such a boon. I also appreciate how compact they are, all stacking together neatly. You can level off your ingredients easily by running a knife across the top because the handle does not get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Odd sizes - 1/8, 2/3, and 3/4 cups are RARE finds!
customer_reviews.text: We have started cooking at home a lot more and needed a better variety of measuring cups. It was great to find a set with odd sizes - 1/8, 2/3, and 3/4 cups are RARE finds! The quality is great. The cups come on a hinged ring to keep them together. We highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: DMI

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking a long time for these.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking a long time for stackable metal cups such as these with labels that won't rub off, and at least the 1 cup with other measurements on the side for smaller portions. A bonus with these is all of the cups have smaller measurements on the sides as well. They stack more compact than my old ones. I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cutler

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I love that the measurements are stamped in and can not be washed away ! They hold up well! I’ve been using and loving them for three years now!! No rust or anything!
customer_reviews.author: Ph

customer_reviews.title: Sharp handles that are too short!
customer_reviews.text: I HATE the handles! They are way to short and feel sharp. They have nub for stacking ease but makes scooping flour and sugar painful!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Measuring Cups
customer_reviews.text: I cook daily. Most of the time breakfast and dinner every day. I depend on my kitchen tools, pots and pans. On the note I love these measuring cups. Easy to use, easy to clean, durable and accurate. Great product. I'd totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Meena

customer_reviews.title: Made of good, sturdy stanless steel
customer_reviews.text: Pros : It gives a wider variety of cup sizes. Made of good, sturdy stanless steel. Cons : The nesting cups are rather hard to seperate from one another and that gets to be a real pain when you are an avid baker
customer_reviews.author: Raven Poe

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding gift!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a wedding gift from the newlyweds Amazon Registry. Was easy to use the registry and the measuring cup set was an excellent gift. Arrived in great condition and just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lilwags

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: love that it's all one piece, no handle to break off
customer_reviews.author: Dean Bednarchik

customer_reviews.title: Rounded bottoms make it easy to scrape out ingredients like mayo with a spatula
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality measuring cups. My last set (plastic) lost their quantity markings several years ago. These have stamped in markings which will never disappear. Rounded bottoms make it easy to scrape out ingredients like mayo with a spatula. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wichita Shopper

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FOR EVERYDAY COOKING.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT AND EASY TO CLEAN ALSO YOU CAN MELT BUTTER SLOWLY ON STOVE TOP DUE TO THEM BEING METAL.
customer_reviews.author: cody c.

customer_reviews.title: Baking delight
customer_reviews.text: The packing was so secure it could survive a natural disaster. It is very convenient to have all of the sizes included. I especially like the ring that connects them because it is so easy to open and take one cup out, then reattach for storage. Very compact.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: I like these cups
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with my stainless steel measuring cups. They are very clearly marked and include 1/8 cup, 2/3 cup, and 3/4 cup measures as well as the standard four.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and well made
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and well made. Enjoy the fact you can see the measurements inside of the cups in addition to the pour spout on each and everyone of them.
customer_reviews.author: ROJOVILLA

customer_reviews.title: These are the best measuring cups ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best measuring cups ever. They are sturdy and strong with engraved measures. I was so excited to get these, and exceeded my expectations! Best measuring cups ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Smile Loud :D

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. I appreciate the variety of sizes
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I appreciate the variety of sizes, quantity markings are easy to read and the cups stay stacked without tipping over. Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zazoo 3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. They nest very well to save space, and all fit stacked in my drawer. The cups are sturdy and feel very high quality. I like that the sizes are engraved in the cups, since my previous set had the printed-on numbers fade to invisible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They fit so nicely in my kitchen drawer ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They fit so nicely in my kitchen drawer and nice to have all the different sizes. Good quality and they wash so nicely.
customer_reviews.author: IT P.

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight
customer_reviews.text: These were way lighter-weight than I expected for the price. I much prefer Williams Sonoma brand. If you want something more compact and thinner, these are fine. Just don't expect a nice heavy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I love weight & using stainless steel. I combined it with a set of measuring spoons that are "tad, pinch etc." Wish I could find a complete set from a drop to 1cup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good-looking kitchen tools
customer_reviews.text: Well built and lovely measuring cups. I like the short handles. The capacity is clearly engraved in cups and mL on each handle.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Only receive six cops not seven
customer_reviews.text: I only received 6 cups the 1/8 new cup was not in the box . Very disappointing it sent back
customer_reviews.author: melanie higgins

customer_reviews.title: The measurements on the inside are just awesome, they are solid
customer_reviews.text: Everything you ever wished for in a measuring cup, and didn't even realize existed. The measurements on the inside are just awesome, they are solid, comfortable, and just really well thought out and a joy to use. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: LantauMama

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what they need to be. Easy to use, accurate and fit in the jars I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. Nice heavy pieces. I will be ordering another set of my sister who really liked mine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lemanski

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive 7 pc. set.
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive my 1/8 cup. I only have 6 pc.'s.
customer_reviews.author: Othious

customer_reviews.title: They nest well for storage and I really like the fact that they will sit flat on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Really heavy duty stainless steel. They nest well for storage and I really like the fact that they will sit flat on the counter, even when I am pouring liquid into them. I highly recommend these measuring cups.
customer_reviews.author: model a dude

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd had these 30 years ago
customer_reviews.text: I love the pour spouts for slowly adding wet ingredients to food processor, blender, etc. No splashing and more accurate than glass measuring cup.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Austin

customer_reviews.title: No one ever has enough measure cups
customer_reviews.text: One of several birthday presents for my older sister. This is one she agreed to accept.
customer_reviews.author: JACKIE SUDIA

customer_reviews.title: More sizes than others, very nice stainless
customer_reviews.text: The measuring cups are very nice stainless steel. Real nice set, with more sizes than most sets. That makes cooking and baking less of a chore.
customer_reviews.author: inxs4

customer_reviews.title: She loved them. These odd measures are not the norm ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who does a lot of cooking. She loved them. These odd measures are not the norm so you really have to look hard especially to find a good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: Like them a lot. Very well made sturdy product. Will probably never need another set of these as long as I live.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Love the measuring cups. A pet peeve is that measuring cups never stack well. THESE DO! Finally. And the little pour spout keeps the counter top clean instead of having the liquids run down the side and drip everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: I like having more than one set of measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: Loving these! I like having more than one set of measuring cups. The 3/4, 2/3. 1/8 cups are great to have. You can't have too many sets if you do much baking!
customer_reviews.author: TXSenora

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the best measuring cups ever. I love that there is a 1/8 cup so I don't have to use a tablespoon twice, and 2/3 and 3/4 also make things easier. Very high quality stainless steel. Comes with an easily latched and unlatched keyring to keep them organized.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Long

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of these measuring cups and their design. I made the right choice buying them.
customer_reviews.author: WON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stocking stuffers for one of the cooks in my life...
customer_reviews.author: LucyDog

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, good selection of sizes, and these have interior markings which is incredibly helpful. Definitely worth the higher price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, solid and well-made cups
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, solid and well-made cups. I especially like the stamped lines showing other measures on each cup. Should last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: P.R.O.

customer_reviews.title: There Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set 😃 I leave them I my counter top so there easy to grab!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey L. Rupp

customer_reviews.title: These are great cups, with a wonderful assortment of sizes and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great cups, with a wonderful assortment of sizes and surprisingly, my favorite feature is the short handles, they fit in just about any draw.
customer_reviews.author: Erri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and heavy and an awesome set of measuring cups! I don't have to worry about them bending or breaking on me! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Shoopmans

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased to find these measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased to find these measuring cups. With the amount of baking I do, the plastic ones just don't hold up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dessert69Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Quality cups. Great design. Easy to clean. Will last for ever.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Clark

customer_reviews.title: No 2 cup measure
customer_reviews.text: I ordered specifically because I was looking for a 2 cup measure. It was my own fault that I'd didnt realize it was included in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.

customer_reviews.title: Like that thay are each one piece of metal
customer_reviews.text: Like that thay are each one piece of metal. So if they are dropped the handle does not fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These stack so neatly that they fit easily into my rather shallow drawer just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these measuring cups. Very good quality...thick but not heavy and stack very well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, Love, LOVE this set! I had been using a 4-piece plastic set before this, but I bake A ton and have to adjust recipes for doubling or halving all the time and this set makes life so much easier to do so! I love them! They are so easy to use and clean; they're wonderful! <3
customer_reviews.author: delphcb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Made well and easy to read and use
customer_reviews.author: Jonney Miller Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great set of measuring cups!
customer_reviews.text: Great and convenient. sometimes they get a bit stuck when nested but other than that they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Will D.

customer_reviews.title: My cup no longer runeth over ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight of these measuring cups. They're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received right on time! Love the product. Just what I have been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: cmareecowell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. No problem. Delivered on time. Would buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Green Eye Shades

customer_reviews.title: Great set of measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: Great set of measuring cups! They are certainly not flimsy. Made of heavyweight stainless steel so should last a lifetime. They stack nicely in the drawer which is always helpful. My one small criticism is that I think I would prefer the handles to be slightly longer. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: used daily - love them
customer_reviews.text: these are the best! quality, easy to use. i love them so much i bought two sets!
customer_reviews.author: noneya

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Heavy solid quality to them
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Heavy solid quality to them. Easy to separate to clean one or two. Clearly etched! Company is family owned and clearly concerned about customer satisfaction. Several additional sizes in addition to standard sizes.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Loved the various sizes and the quality of the measuring cups. The delivery was very quick which worked very well.

customer_reviews.text: The more I've baked the more I appreciate accurate measurements and these work perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: I don't know... they are cups that ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know...they are cups that measure stuff. I don't see how these are more special than the ten dollar version. I do use them though, but I don't see what the extra cost is for.
